attributes.action: Open a public enquiry into the claims of  David Icke. To review all evidence to state clearly if any of his claims can be substantiated.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: David Icke has made many claims beginning in the early 80's with various t.v and radio broadcasts. So far he is allowed to make these claims without any real evidence. It is the role of any government to investigate claims against individuals working for them so therefore it is in the public interest to look into what David Icke has said.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
